scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists entirely of correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Primarily correspondence between the Business Manager and the Bursar dealing with authorizations for expenditures, salary change authorizations, requests for authorizations, statements covering balances at various times and of various accounts. Included are some early letters to T. Mitchell Prudden and some letters requesting that items be placed on docket for Executive Committee meetings. Also includes some correspondence regarding subscriptions and costs of publications, letters regarding status of various laboratory accounts in relation to budgeted amounts (frequent reference to state of Noguchi and Landsteiner expenditures). 1941-1946 much of correspondence deals with receipt of agreements and letters of intent concerning various contracts with U.S. Government for research investigations and bids for the purchase of used equipment.
